Hello all!

My name is Dennis born in Germany but live in belgium =P

Im new to ksp , i have pre ordered it yesterday and thought why not say hello! This is the second time i make account on a forum. Mostly read it as guest but after reading nice ,helpfull funny comments here on the forum made me join so here i am

sorry for my bad english realy sorry

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi,

I\'m german too and I have to say that I finally found out about the sense of google translator with this forum... I always thought it was for generating random new grammar for an existing language ;P

Hi! I live in Belgium too.

Welcome to the forums. Enjoy your stay .
